oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Describing the consumption of a granular mineral supplement containing chlortetracycline by gestating beef cattle on pasture
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: McKnight, M.
Jumper, W.I.
Harvey, K.
Drewery, M.
Potts, C.
Cordero, J.
Russell, J.
Smith, D.R.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The objective of this study was to explore the consumption fre­quency of a granular, chlortetracycline (CTC)-containing min­eral supplement offered free-choice to beef cows on pasture.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; Vol. 58 No. 58 (2024): 2024 AABP Annual Conference Proceedings; 198
